Articles.Content: Hello, new member here.  Even though I've had KSP1 for over a year, and now KSP2 as well, I'm too nervous to launch any manned missions beyond Kerbin's SOI, in fear of stranding them.  Any tips on how to improve efficiency?

Kerbals don't mind being stranded.   But there's nothing wrong with sending uncrewed probes anyway. That's what real space programs have mostly done, after all. Stick with those until you feel comfortable sending crews, just like the real programs. 

And welcome to the forum.
